Text: Hi Claudia; let me just take this opportunity to wish you happy (remaining...) x-mas days and a very happy New Year. Although I've given up on B&B (it's just too awful...sorry!) it doesn't mean your great efforts have gone unnoticed by me. Cheers for everything :)

Hi there!! I wish you too a happy, happy Christmas and also a great, superb, magnificent 2011!! Well, no soap is for everybody, the good thing is that there is plenty of choice yet, so you can choose one soap that fits you! And thanks to you for being there!!!!
